```{asis, echo = {{setup_select_knit}}, eval = {{setup_select_knit}}, include = {{setup_select_knit}}}
### Select a number to square
```

```{r, echo = {{setup_select_knit}}, include = {{setup_select_knit}}}
number <- {{setup_select_number}}
square <- {{setup_select_square}}

renderText(glue::glue("{number}^2 = {square}"))
```
